signals.problem_statement: The customer is facing disorganization and clutter in their current email handling process, leading to missed communications.
signals.customer_ask: A centralized platform to handle emails and chat support.
signals.suggested_solution: A structured flow that acts as a bridge between the team and customers.
signals.context: A team of five handling customer support across multiple regions.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks individual email addresses for team members, which complicates email management.
signals.customer_ask: To introduce individual email addresses for team members.
signals.suggested_solution: Using personal Gmail accounts for company-related inboxes is not ideal.
signals.context: A team of five handling customer support across multiple regions.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for AI capabilities to automate responses based on keywords to improve response times.
signals.customer_ask: AI responses to customer inquiries based on keywords.
signals.suggested_solution: AI agents to handle conversations before they reach human agents.
signals.context: A team of five handling customer support across multiple regions.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs to set up SLA policies to manage response times effectively.
signals.customer_ask: To understand how to set SLA breaches.
signals.suggested_solution: Setting up SLA policies for different emails based on response times.
signals.context: A team of five handling customer support across multiple regions.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to download analytics reports to track SLA breaches and customer inquiries.
signals.customer_ask: To know how to download analytics reports.
signals.suggested_solution: Exporting reports to CSV based on different parameters.
signals.context: A team of five handling customer support across multiple regions.
